Aaron giving a talk at WordCamp Minneapolis. Photo by Found Art Photography

Aaron Holbrook, In a Nutshell

I’m Aaron Holbrook, Director of Web Engineering at Zeek.

I’ve used WordPress since 2004, am a core contributor and am an author of multiple plugins and packages.

I build amazing WordPress powered publishing solutions and architect robust deployment and delivery processes.

I enjoy helping others become better developers and have spoken at several conferences including WordCamp Milwaukee, WordCamp Grand Rapids, WordCamp Providence, WordCamp Chicago and CMS Expo.

If you’re interested, you could totally catch some of my talks over on WordPress.tv.

I built a mechanism to easily clear the cache on WP Engine.

I created a plugin to perform heavy or infrequent actions in a controlled and reproducible manner.

I put together a pretty neat way to sync your dotfiles quickly and easily across many machines.

Want to say hello? Ping me on twitter @aaronjholbrook to start a conversation!
